title: [K-12] Student-Centered Science Inquiry Project Using Web-Based Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science theories and fundamental digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Although learners are non-experts, they possess rich scientific curiosity and engage in both online and offline activities using personal devices (BYOD). Their ability to solve real scientific problems is assessed through project-based evaluations.

learning_goals: Learners can select at least three Web 2.0 tools suitable for scientific inquiry topics and integrate them into a collaborative platform.
Learners can complete a project that visually represents scientific concepts by creating digital artifacts (content).
Learners can design feedback cycles using a peer assessment system and improve the efficiency of educational tool utilization by over 20%.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
